main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a large elliptical or saucer-shaped UFO in Elk Creek, Missouri on January 17, 1967.
interesting points: The object descended to an elevation of 100 feet or lower and hovered for several minutes.,It was described as metallic and emitted an orange glow.,The estimated diameter of the object was about 50-75 feet.,The sighting was confirmed by a deputy sheriff and several other witnesses.,The report was part of the Project Blue Book records.
witness description: civilian who observed the object through field glasses
